Payment: 470.35 BGN banktransfer (payment_on_Booking.com)
Extra: In the well-equipped kitchen, guests will find a stovetop, a refrigerator, a dishwasher and an oven. This apartment has air conditioning, a washing machine, a flat-screen TV and a balcony. The unit has 2 beds.
Facilities: Tea/Coffee maker, Air conditioning, Hairdryer, Iron, Balcony, Refrigerator, Dishwasher, Washing machine, Heating, Kitchen, Flat-screen TV, Oven, Stovetop, Towels, Linens, Toilet paper, Body soap, Smoke Alarm, Fire extinguisher
Smoking: NO
reservations.cancel_penalty: The guest can cancel free of charge until 1 day before arrival. The guest will be charged the total price if they cancel within 1 day before arrival. 415.35 BGN From: 2023-08-18 03:08
